name: Galactic Asteroid Miner
description:
Mine and sell asteroids to upgrade your ship. See how far you can travel. Try to discover all 13 celestial bodies ranging from Brown dwarfs to Black holes, but don't keep your eye off the fuel meter!

  • Infinite procedural generation
  • The further you travel, the rarer the asteroids
  • How high of a score can you get?
How to play
  • W, A, S, D to move
  • Hold SHIFT to fly faster
  • MOUSE BUTTON/SPACE to shoot
  • TAB while hovering depot to refuel

(Browser version may run slow )

View the full source code for yourself, all assets included:

https://github.com/zephkelly/galactic-asteroid-miner
